Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Pump cavitation noise observed. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 23/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
